title: Greener earth - TYPE ID
content:
What font is the “Greener earth” text?  
I lost the ai file when i reinstalled so need to re create and need the right font...

Img:  
 [http://img518.imageshack.us/img518/5968/tshirtfh7.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20071129212357/http:/img518.imageshack.us/img518/5968/tshirtfh7.jpg "http://img518.imageshack.us/img518/5968/tshirtfh7.jpg")

author: hollowell

comments.content:
Hi William,

have you gone through the [Bowfin Printworks’ Script Font ID Guide](http://web.archive.org/web/20071129212357/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/ScriptIDGuide.html), esp. [Part 11](http://web.archive.org/web/20071129212357/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/Script11Pg1.html) and [12](http://web.archive.org/web/20071129212357/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/Script12Pg1.html)?

F
